name: Magnet Mania (Genrely)
description:
Magnet Mania!

Charge up your electromagnet to change your attraction between 2 metal walls!

This game was programmed/developed by myself, as I am not an artist or musician all art assets and sound effects were used from free to use resources, all of which are linked below!

Scores are saved to a leaderboard using LootLocker!

Try to get to the top of the Leaderboard!

How To Play:

Hold down either "Spacebar" or "Left Mouse Button" to charge up your speed

Release to travel to other side

Survive and collect coins to gain points!

ASSETS USED:

Starfield Skybox - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox...

Metal Floor (Rust Low) Texture - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/metals/metal-floor-r...

Stylized Lava Texture - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/stylized-lava...

Energy Cells Free - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/energy-cells-free-1...

Lightning Bolt Effect for Unity - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/lightning-bolt-eff...

Shield Model - https://sloyd.ai/

Collecting Money Coins E Sound Effect - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/sound-effects-search.php?q=coin

Electricity Long D Sound Effect - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/electricity-...

Electricity Short Zap Burst A Sound - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/electricity-...

Retro Platforming by David Fesliyan - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
